member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.#ctor
member.remarks: The documenter name is set to "LaTeX".

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.MakeTextTeXCompatible(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Translates all text contained in the node (and it's children) into LaTeX compatable text.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.CompileTexDocument
member.summary: Calls the LaTeX processor to compile the TeX file into a DVI or PDF.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.WriteTeXDocument(NDoc.Core.Workspace,System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Uses XSLT to transform the current document into LaTeX source.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.DevelopmentStatus
member.summary: The development status (alpha, beta, stable) of this documenter.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.LatexConfig
member.summary: Gets the Configuration object for this documenter.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenter.MainOutputFile
member.summary: Returns the path to the output file.
member.remarks: If a PDF or DVI file with the same name as the TeX file exists the path to that file is returned.

remarks.para: The LaTeX documenter can be used to create dvi or postscript documents.
This documenter requires that a LaTeX compiler be installed. You can download a free one from www.MiKTeX.org.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenterConfig.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the output directory.
member.remarks: The folder documentation will be created. This can be absolute or relative from the .ndoc project file.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenterConfig.TextFileFullName
member.summary: Gets the full name of the LaTeX document.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenterConfig.TexFileBaseName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the LaTeX document excluding the file extension.
member.remarks: Name of the LaTeX document, excluding the file extension.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenterConfig.LatexCompiler
member.summary: Gets or sets the LaTeX compiler path.
member.remarks: Path to the LaTeX compiler executable (Set to empty if you do not have LaTeX installed).

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexDocumenterConfig.TexFileFullPath
member.summary: Gets the path of the output file.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.Latex.LatexWorkspace.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Manages the location of the documentation build process
member.param: The location to create the workspace
